Name: Zaida
description: Zaida, 36, is married and has four children. She has a high school diploma and from 2006 has been engaged in farming. She started her business with a sum of 10,000 som. Through her hard work, she owns a 1.80 ha plot of land where she grows beans and clover for sale. She also has three cows and ten sheep. Her monthly income amounts to about 10,000 som (KGS). Hoping to expand her business, she is requesting a loan of 70,000 Kyrgyz som (KGS) from Bai-Tushum bank to buy additional livestock and fertilizer. She plans to invest the profit in expanding her business, buy a tractor and prepare her son for primary school.
